Tips.Description: See link below for the current team used. All testing was done using 5x pokemon. Budget breeds can be done, but to what limit was not tested.
Consumables
1000x Potions (should last you 2-3 runs).
50x Sitrus Berry (only to heal Blissey when she needs more than 12.5% HP healed)
20x Burn Heal (should last you few runs)
20x Antidote (should last some runs)
20x Parlyz Heal (should last some runs)
10x Energy Root
40x Revival Herb
For $ charm, Amulet Coin is at least recommended until you're comfortable with the run and can reach all 5 E4, then I'd move into 75% Riches Charm. 100% is not worth it.
Hold Items
50x Air Baloons (should last you few runs)
50x Aguav Berries (should last you few runs)
Battle Items
10x X.Defend (should last you few runs)
10x X.Special (should last you few runs)
10x X.Special Defense (should last you few runs)
40x X.Speed (you will use at least 1 per fight)

Description: Recommended path: Unova -> Johto -> Kanto -> Hoenn -> Sinnoh

Tips.Description: Kanto, Hoenn and Sinnoh can use mom to heal.
On Unova, your party gets automatically healed after beating champion.
On Johto, your mom doesn't heal nor beating the champion.
